txt.en: Poisoned warriors are resting in Amdân.\n\nEdash has tasked you with administering an antidote to the poisoned warriors.
'Bleh, that tastes foul, but... I think I feel a little better.'
'Hopefully I can keep this down... ooohh.'
'An antidote? Come give it here, then, and quickly.'
'You could not have come at a better time, friend. I was ready to give up at ever feeling better.'
'Well done, friend. You saved many lives today! They will live to fight on.'
Edash is located in Amdân.\n\nBring the antidote pouch to Edash.
Edash was able to craft an antidote to the poison, but time is running out for the afflicted.

'You did a fine job collecting the twistbeard. I have prepared the poison's antidote. Administer it to our fallen comrades here and in the nearby camps. If I am correct, they should feel relief right away.'
